main event: On 29 September 1949, multiple witnesses observed unidentified flying objects in the sky near Enid, Oklahoma.
interesting points: Witnesses described seeing seven objects first, then a larger group of 50 to 100, moving in a circular formation before separating into a straight line., The objects gleamed in the sunlight, resembling shiny silver aircraft., The observers noted that the objects were round, with some describing them as disc-like or bird-shaped., The sightings were reported to have occurred in clear weather conditions with no other aircraft in the vicinity., The objects were reported to move at a speed twice that of a B-25 aircraft.
witness description: Both witnesses were military personnel with experience in aviation and navigation.
